Class Description
Block

BlockChainImplement
generate transaction signature broadcast verified and accepted by all peers verify mined Node and add to blockchain be verified by enough blocks
BlockChainInterface
the interface for block chain service
Coder
KEY_ALGORITHM = "RSA" SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM = "MD5withRSA"; ref: https://www.devglan.com/java8/rsa-encryption-decryption-java
Controller
Controller - This class is the implementation of the MessageLayer, which is to simulate an unreliable network, all the message from each raft peer will be processed by this network, and the network decides whether to delay or drop the messages.
GetStateReply
GetStateReply - a serializable packet wrapper for the getState method of transportLayer
HttpRequest
HTTP tool class HttpRequest to send GET and POST ref: https://www.journaldev.com/7148/java-httpurlconnection-example-java-http-request-get-post https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4205980/java-sending-http-parameters-via-post-method-easily
HTTPService
ref: https://www.baeldung.com/jetty-embedded https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2717294/create-a-simple-http-server-with-java http://avro.apache.org/docs/current/api/java/org/apache/avro/ipc/jetty/HttpServer.html
Main
Main function we can pass 1 argument: the port to start http service 2 arguments: the port to start p2p service 3 arguments: the websocket address to connect to (the peer to connect to)
Message
The simplified message class for communication
Message
Message - Wrapper class of Raft protocol, with arbitary byte data as payload
MessageHandling
MessageHandling -- Interface that defines the API for a Raft node
MessageType
the wrapped message type in p2p message exchanging and serlization process
MessageType
MessageType -- enum to list all available message types
MessagingLayer  
P2PClient
p2pClient
P2PServer
p2pServer
P2PService
receive message and operate according to message type
P2PServiceInterface
the abstract interface for p2p service
RemoteController
RemoteController -- implementation of RemoteControllerInterface, which includes APIs for MessageHandling interface in the Raft node
RemoteControllerInterface
RemoteControllerInterface -- defines the remote callback functions that will provide APIs for a MessageHandling interface for your Raft node
Transaction
Transactions that occur on a blockchain must be validated by a number of the network's participants, A transaction is only valid once the participants verify the transaction and a consensus is reached about its validity.
TransactionInput
A transfer of coins from one address to another creates a transaction in which the outputs can be claimed by the recipient in the input of another transaction.
TransactionOutput
A TransactionOutput contains value and a scriptPubKey that controls who is able to spend its value.
TransactionParam
for parse json strings from http request if use JSON: JSON.parseArray(message,TransactionParam.class) if use GSON: Gson.fromJson((message,TransactionParam.class)
TransportLib
TransportLib -- enables communication among Raft nodes
Wallet
The LabCoin Wallet
